reviews.review: If you want to have fun and actually play it play face it and just face it dont buy the game or nothing like that because vave is just a buch of greedy mf that all the do is get and get but they dont give, dont buy this game at all the community is 80% cheaters and 20% actual players. Just get the game free and dowload Face IT so that you can play competent competitive thank you for your time

game is fucking dog shit, im pretty good at the game like i was global elite like 3 years ago when i was 19. Im 22 now and im not dog shit at any other game yet but this game is fucking stupid, i play in silver games and its either one of 2 things, i usually get absolutely shit on by players because my team is ass but then theres real silver games and the other team doesnt win a round. I play against shit players all the time but sometimes those shit players have games of their lives and fucking hit nothing but headshots and we end up losing but they are dog shit.
cheater game , yea i mention myself
very good game apart from that fact that if you have a new steam account even with prime you have low trust factory so you will have to play against cheaters very often. Very annoying.
